Social And Cultural Activities: Involved in music movements, including music clubs, raised funds for jobless industrial workers and for public interest litigations on environment issues; involved in social rehabilation activities for mentally challenged people
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Produced till now 25 music albums of songs composed by him including those performed by other vocalists; received the `Golden Disc.` from HMV in 1993 for his song album `Tomake Chai`; Directed music for five Bengali movies; received the best Music Director award from BFJA in 1997
Special Interests: Movies,film making, videography and video editing; sound and music production with the help of computer software
Educational Qualifications: B.A. (Hons.) English Literature Educated at Jadavpur University, Kolkata, West Bengal
Name: Suman,Shri Kabir
Countries Visited: Australia, Bangladesh, France, Germany, The Netherland, Nicaragua, Thailand, U.K. and U.S.A.
